---
title: "duplication"
output: html_notebook
---

```{r, message=FALSE}
library(tibble)
library(readr)
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)

dups <- read_csv("../data/duplication.csv", col_types = list("_", "c", "c", "c"))
```
```{r}
uniq_out <- dups %>% select(output) %>% unique()

n_reused <- nrow(dups) - nrow(uniq_out)

sources <- dups %>% group_by(input) %>% summarize(count = n())
types <- dups %>% group_by(type) %>% summarize(count = n())
```
```{r}
ggplot(types, aes(x = type, y = count)) + geom_col()
```
```{r}
ggplot(sources, aes(x = count)) + geom_histogram(binwidth = 100) + scale_y_log10()
```
